content: or dresses as a fun pop of color ● i imagine the airy blouse would look really nice with full sleeves so don t feel pressure to make the sleeves short and puffy as i did ● i chose not to block my finished garment because i was happy with the fit but if you d like a more relaxed fit i would suggest spray blocking or steam blocking ● this is my first published knitting pattern so if you find any mistakes or confusing instructions especially with the newly added medium and large sizes please reach out to dragonfruitknit on ravelry if you are unfamiliar with the i-cord bind off or i-cord edge i would highly recommend these two videos to learn https //www youtube com/watch v=zcfusezk0ik&t=661s https //www youtube com/watch v=1zhn6ljncy4&t=299s
